alert.note: Alert for Knox; Stark (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 11:39AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Stark and northern Knox Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1138 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rio, or 13 miles north of Galesburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wataga and Oneida around 1155 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Altona and Victoria. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 34 and 44, and between mile markers 55 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
